attributes.action: Instruct all MPs to repay expenses previously claimed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the present debacle over the claims for expenses by members of all political parties all previous submissions should be repaid to the governing body. Resubmissions should then be submitted for genuine expenses incurred carrying out parliamentary duties

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
